website_summaries.verdict: One of the best ultracompacts available, the Canon PowerShot SD940 IS nonetheless falls short of greatness in performance and photo quality.
pros: very good photo, HD movie quality
cons: No optical zoom in Movie mode

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic. It's so small but yet takes great pictures. You really notice the wider angle lens vs. previous generations, especially when in small tight spaces like taking a picture of a room. It starts up really quickly so you hopefully won't miss too many shots. It doesn't take great quality low light pictures and has a weak flash, but every compact camera has those issues. The HD video mode is a nice feature on such a small camera and perfect for impromptu video moments or times you can't carry something bigger (for example: skiing/ snowboarding). Overall, it's a great camera that can be carried anytime due to it's size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot SD940 IS
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and purchased, and returned, two other camera before I found the SD940 IS to be the one. I am extremely nearsighted and the 2.7" screen was better than the 3" widescreen on the SD980 IS. This camera is perfect in every way. It embodies just the right stuff!! Other camera, more expensive and some not, had too much unnecessary features. I wanted a camer that had some weight to it, took great pictures, great video and was compact. This camera fit the bill and was perfect for me. I recommend this camera to those who want a great digital camera with simplicity, yet a lot of camera.
customer_reviews.author: HannaBeach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST camera for a point and shoot! It is compact, easy to use and takes wonderfully clear photos. I have had several people who own other well-known name brand cameras comment on the clarity of the photos and ease of use. It is my second camera of this model and I shopped specifically for it when my other camera was damaged at the airport by the inspectors dropping it on a concrete floor. I would purchase it again and again...you do not need more pixels with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my wife, who was tired of hauling around my large DLSR camera with our 6 month old baby. I was sceptical in buying an ultra compact camera, and of the Canon brand after investing $1,500 into my Nikon camera. This little camera has been awesome, takes great pictures, and very easy for my wife to use as a basic point and shoot. Perfect size for carrying in a pocket, although it is almost too small, in that holding in your hand and using the shutter button can be a little difficult if you have large hands or fingers. I'd buy this camera again and would recomend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Good Quick Easy to use Camera, Decent Photo Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great size and portability. I bought this for my mom b/c it is small and light. It is also pretty much a turn it on, snap a picture, and turn it off, and you're done. She isn't very good with gadgets so I wanted something that would basically do all the adjusting automatically. Her pictures are no longer blurry or too dark. The quality is satisfactory to me, but then again I am used to using a dslr. It fires up pretty quick and snaps the first photo within a couple seconds. It also has a decent wide angle perspective.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera, horrible depreciation
customer_reviews.text: We live in an era of point & shoot cameras becoming obsolete. Although I bought this camera more than three years ago and sold it just a year later, I got only a fifth of what I paid for it, and this was with it in like-new condition and all the original accessories. You can push this thing quite a bit when shooting on manual; it was to the point where some friends couldn't recognize my pictures from it vs. those from my 5D - truly remarkable!
customer_reviews.author: Nikola

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for over a year now & continue to love it. Awesome battery life, picture quality & ease of use. Only issue I have is that the black paint on the trim ring around the lens chips off very easily. I wish I had gotten the silver version. I ended up taking the camera apart, removing that trim ring & repainting it myself. Other than that-no complaints. This is my 4th Canon Elph(one stolen, others just wore out due to extensive use) and thus I swear by Canon & will never own any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGuy

customer_reviews.title: great point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Not being a huge camera person, I was looking for a decent quality point and shoot camera that I didnt have to have a manual to use. Been using this for over a month and couldnt be happier with it. I usually leave it on auto and let it do its thing, and it takes great pics. Also the camera was smaller than I expected, but the LCD screen is plenty big enough to see the pics without problem. overall, if you want a point and shoot perfect pocket sized camera, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Almost, but not quite, perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is an overall very good camera that I would recommend, but it still has a few issues. First, it has some shutter lag, just like many of its competitors. Second, my older Canon SD 1100is seemed to take better still shots. The fact that this newer camera takes HD video makes it a good buy (the SD 1100is did not take HD video but it did take very good DVD quality video). Portability and build quality are good. Canon's are a bit more expensive than competitors but I've been mostly pleased with mine and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: very compact
customer_reviews.text: I had previously owned a much larger camera but decided, when it was stolen, to move to a smaller one that fit better into a fanny pack. This certainly fit the bill - actually took me a while to learn how to hold it because it is so small. Pictures are clear and easy to download. Since I've had a Canon before, I could easily understand the menu. People admire the large screen. It does hesitate before actually taking a picture, but not as long as some I've seen. I've really enjoyed the wide angle setting - could fit quite a large group in one shot. Battery life lasted through over 100 photos over two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Education and Training Systems

customer_reviews.title: Image quality is quite good and it is light and easy to carry with ...
customer_reviews.text: Has been my pocket camera now for years. Image quality is quite good and it is light and easy to carry with me. I may upgrade it this year and will undoubtedly choose another Canon point-and-shoot
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bill Bushing

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. I have to be honest, I just googled the best digital camera for 2010 and this camera popped up. My last two cameras blitzed within a year of purchase, and I reviewed cameras extensively. Needless to say it was a huge disappointment, I believe one was the Kodak snapshot. I am extremely pleased with this camera, it is very compact and easy to use, and most important..great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Toaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this camera. It is a great point and shoot. Picks are great and its small. I only do not have because I gave to a friend in another country during a visit. He was going pic crazy with it. I can not believe it still cost so much. I bought it at least 3 years ago and I think cheaper by a few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Ross

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot SD 940IS Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to receive my order even earlier than the anticipated date. The camera arrived well packaged. I cannot review the quality as it is a Christmas gift-can rate later. This has nothing to do with the vendor but, the only thing that disappointed is that I put my order in early to avoid the rush, and then found sales on this item that would have saved me $65 locally, and I had to pay postage. I will now wait to save next year. Diana
customer_reviews.author: D. Crighton

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Canon Cameras and have had several of them. This compact camera is powerful and ultra portable, I give the camera great reviews except that the buttons on the back are hard to press. I heard the review from many people stating that the buttons are hard to use and thought nothing of it but it is true they are very difficult however I still love the camera =)
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Medina

customer_reviews.title: i love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this camera for a few weeks but i love it. I had bought 4 other camera's before finding this one. I have 2 young kids and i needed a camera that takes pictures fast. In low lighting it takes a sec. to take the picture but with good bright lighting it takes immediatly. The picture quality is wonderful, the pictures are very colorful and so crisp. The buttons are small and flat but they just take some getting use to. This camera is a wonderful camera to own if you are looking for a small great picturing taking camera. I would recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: S.Eick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Canon's point and shoot cameras since buying my first one in 2003. This is my third canon point and and shoot as I gave my first one to my parents to upgrade and lost my second camera while on vacation. UI is extremely friendly and can be changed quickly to get the perfect shot. I'm a fan of using the macro and different color settings and find the settings acceptable when I don't want to bust out the DSLR. While this review is slightly old, I'm sure the upgraded models are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: eugene

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and very good and efficient Brand.
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera! Does its job as its suppose to. For the price, the best bang-for-the-buck. Simple, easy to use, and I find the quality same as more expensive brands such as Sony. Solid, reliable camera. Definitely give a try!
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with a Wide Angle...
customer_reviews.text: Worth Every penny. If your going to get a pocket camera, first off you need to make sure its a canon. Secondly, and especially if your one of those people that like to hold ur camera out in front of urself and take pics at parties, u wanna make sure u have THIS camera or another canon with the wide angle lens. The picture quality is exceptional and the battery life is pretty good. Wont fail you.
customer_reviews.author: Akbersaeed

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: Great small camera. Excellent quality pictures. One drawback to the software that comes with the camers (ZoombrowserEX). It only allows printing photos one at a time, you cannot print 4 images per page of photo paper. You can overcome the problem by using the print function for images that is part of Windows.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Baddass little camera
customer_reviews.text: I really love this camera, it is my first digital camera and boy did I pick a good one. The pictures look really good and the hd video is awesome too, my only complaint would be that in the dark it is sometimes hard to find the power button with it being flush and all, but I can overlook that, the battery live is so so. If you are planning on going on a shooting spree mixed in with video taken, you had better get a back up battery, I did. All that aside I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Frank the Tank

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I got it after much research because I wanted to get the smallest high quality P & S. I'm an advanced amateur with two DSLR's but needed a small P & S for the wife to use and for me to carry when I wanted something really, really small. The SD940IS is truly small but delivers very high quality photos. The only quibbles I have are that the menus take some getting used to and the buttons on the back are so small that they require me to use my fingernail rather than my finger to operate them. Other than that, it's a great little camera and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Cox

customer_reviews.title: canon has won my heart
customer_reviews.text: as a professional photographer who normally uses nikon products, i finally decided to try something new in the point-and-shoot department. i LOVE this camera. it's great in low light settings even when no flash is being used. it's fast, easily portable and easy to use. definitely a great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. MontgomeryTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: This was a great deal on a used digital camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal on a used digital camera. Aside from a few minor scratches (as advertised), it was fine. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Great portability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace a very old Casio. My main desire was to have something portable that did good video and could be used at clubs/parties etc. I'm very impressed with the flash when using it in clubs. Even at a distance it illuminates the subjects. Also the wide angle means you can get everyone in the picture. The macro is excellent, the best I have used in a camera of this size. The daytime picture quality is pretty good but I was expecting a little better. I am willing to forego this for the share portability of the camera though - easy to slip into the front pocket of a pair of jeans.
customer_reviews.author: mpressive

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: We have a big Canon digital camera and a big video camera. I wanted something small to take on trips or fishing that could also shoot videos. This is better than I expected! The video quality is great, and the camera is so easy to use. There are newer versions with touch screen, but I think this one is quicker & easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: JKRodeo

customer_reviews.title: Almost the best
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for good Canon camera, and on couple of websites recommended this camera as the best in the range $180 - $230. I liked SD 1300 IS but SD 940 IS has HD recording so that's the main reason why I opted for this model. Camera is good and I like that it's compact. Everything is perfect except: - microphone does not capture sounds if person who talks is 5 feet away, or it captures, but with very low volume. - when you zoom during recording, video gets blurry - buttons on camera sometimes make noise (type of noise from cheap materials used)
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use, and great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera that takes beautiful photos in a lightweight (and easily portable) device! This camera allows me to take basic photos but also do more advanced photography when I want to!
customer_reviews.author: JS2-2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great, easily one of the best P&S I've ever owned or even seen among anyone who has a digital camera. I actually had the same model but with the 3x zoom and lost it on the slopes, so when I came back to get another one, I found this one with the 4x zoom and feel it is worth every penny. I rarely rave about products, especially electronics, but this one has turned out to be everything I wanted, very compact, easy to use, decent battery life, and most importantly, great quality of pics. I highly recommend it to anyone who is looking in the $200 range for a P&S digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chandrasekaran

customer_reviews.title: This camera packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: First off Id like to say that I bought this camera mainly for the video mode and not for taking pictures. This is a GREAT quality camera that really packs a great punch! Ive been using this now for over two months and I have to say, Ive never been more satisfied with a camera like this in a long time. This is a SMALL camera and when I mean SMALL!!! This camera is great to record video and to take photos. No complaints about this camera but I will keep updating my review so if anything breaks you'll be warned... or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Visionary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great clear photos! Way better then the stupid "Coolpix" camera I traded in for. The color of the photos is really great. I'm probably comparing to the Coolpix which every photo had a yellowish tint. I'd definitely recommend this camera for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, horrible support software.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Fantastic pics and movies. Software for editing and converting movie files sucks, clunky and very difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: SO good.
customer_reviews.text: This little camera can do so many cool things. I have taken it on a lot of hikes and it kept banging up against rocks. I sent it back to Canon because i had bashed it so many times, the lens would not pop out. Within a few days Canon sent it back to me, practically brand new (minus the scratches i had put on it) Canon is a great company; they are very easy to work with. They didn't charge me a cent for the repair and i was able to take the camera on my trip to Kauai. Love this camera. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aja

customer_reviews.title: Cannot change focus while recording video
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for its ability to record 720p video. Although it was obvious from reviews that the optical zoom could not be used while recording video, it was not at all clear that the camera does not change focus while recording. If your subject moves closer to the camera (or farther away) while recording, it will go out of focus. I missed this when reading other reviews. The user manual, which can be downloaded from the Canon USA website, states this clearly -- if you know where to look. Based on their respective user manuals, it appears that the Powershot SD780 IS and SD1400 IS have the same limitation.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, it fits anywhere. Ou have to be careful or it can fall very easily. Picture quality us great. sometime you have to play with the settings a bit. I'm happy with it so far
customer_reviews.author: Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great images!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that comes across my camera immediately thinks - "wow, nice..." That's great and everything, but it wouldn't mean anything if the quality of the images wasn't great. This camera takes fantastic pictures for a point and shoot. Ooh - and I love that I can shoot HD video with it as well. Get a 8GB minimum memory card. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Z. Cardon

customer_reviews.title: Solid camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great for the price. Ultra portable which makes it super convenient to slip in your pocket and take out for the day or night. Only a few minor drawbacks for the camera. There is a longer then average saving time when taking pictures when a flash is on. Also do not expect DSLR photo quality or anything like this out of the camera, you won't be gracing the cover of photography magazine with it anytime soon. However if you need a solid, high quality, ULTRA compact point and shoot this is it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Glaspey

customer_reviews.title: Small Handy pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: I owned Canon SD 790 before this, and loved it, but had to let it go. This one is obviously more smaller and sleeker. It is definitely better than SD 780 because of 4x zoom, bigger lens and display size, and i feel also a bit more sturdier. However, the picture quality though better than 780 is lesser than older 790 The menus are quite nice and usable, and camera is definitely more faster and responsive. It stays nicely in pocket, and good enough to take all types of shots. The video quality isnt bad at all, hdmi o/p is cool and I am wondering why I need my Sony handycam anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Mahajan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good
customer_reviews.text: It's a very very light camera that fits in you pocket and takes very good pictures. It's Canon... so it's good!
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Canon doesn't disappoint with this shirt pocket gem. Easy to carry, easy to use, loaded with features for more advanced shooting or point and shoot automatically. Picture quality is good and its video capability is adequate for home use. We're glad we chose the SD940IS.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my folks to replace their old outdated camera and they absolutely love it. Easy to use and high quality pix and videos.
customer_reviews.author: campaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great Camer!
customer_reviews.text: I started to buy cannon about three years ago. My battery can last for months at a time. Now the camera I just purchased is incredibly compact and extremely easy to use. I know reading some of these reviews you can get mixed feelings about the product, but let me reassure you, this is a great point and shoot camera. It has many features for any occasion or event. If you like cannon, you will love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Carriere

customer_reviews.title: sweet camera - great shots
customer_reviews.text: great camera -- use it all the time. my husband even figured it out and he is really bad at this sort of stuff. very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Canon
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Canon point and shoot. I loved the first one so I upgraded a bit for zoom. Very dependable and long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Janet J. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was good though old model, I need that kind of a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: It was first useing of Amazon.com. I am amateur photographer, make photo by SLR Eos 5, DSLR Eos 5D. I have bought the Canon PowerShot SD940IS for my son during trip in Florida. Info about product is good. I have received product with no any problems and inconveniences. During return back at home i tested this camera, result: it was interesting, we have new possibilities to make photos. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Typical Canon camera, durable, full of features, great picture quality but no battery indicator until the battery is about to die.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for photos & not bulky, e.g. fitted perfectly into my evening handbag to capture moments of a 50th black tie party!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Canon fan for over 25 years (yes, since 35 mm days) and this is my 4th Canon Digital Powershot Elph camera . . . need I say more! Each model is an improvement from the last & yet doesn't climb in price and the photos this one produces are fabulous, plus it's so compact & light, perfect for traveling or to have on hand for those unexpected shots! This Canon is definitely value for money too!
customer_reviews.author: A Bermudian Smith

customer_reviews.title: lived up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the camera in action while visiting a friend I was very impressed with the ease at which the camera was used. The picture quality and the video quality were all that I could ask for being novice. The camera seems to be the right size. fits in any pocket. Smaller and it would be hard to handle. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Veto P. Napolitano

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, fits everywhere. rugged too, my kids dropped several times and bruises on the corners but works well. not good indoor performance but overall a very nice outdoor camera if you like to carry something small.
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet Berk Erturk

customer_reviews.title: good picture
customer_reviews.text: bought it because Consumer reports recommend,take beautiful pictures. so far so good about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: mirrors

customer_reviews.title: great camera.  have purchased two.
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera when it was new as a gift. and a year later saw that CNET reviewed it as being better than it's successor. Its a really small point and shoot camera with EXCELLENT picture quality. I usually play with the settings and use the slow-synchro flash, if any flash at all for great low light pictures.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: The used camera I purchased works great and looks like new
customer_reviews.text: My old Canon PowerShot SD940IS died and stores no longer carried new ones. The used camera I purchased works great and looks like new, at half the price I paid for my original camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mel H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Compact Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love Canon. I think they make the easiest to use and most durable cameras. I had a Canon Elph 200 for years. It still works, I just wanted the upgrade. What an upgrade I got! I love the wide angle lens and huge LCD screen.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Show needs more than 12MP
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy camera, great price - better than trying to learn a new one every couple years. They wear out but you can reuse the batteries!
customer_reviews.author: cimino

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera because it was one of the top rated cameras from Consumer Reports. Not disappointed. Camera takes great photos for the occasional shooter and its slim size makes it nice and portable. I bought an 8GB SD card for it so that I don't have to worry about running out of space.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great Little-Big Camera
customer_reviews.text: The only thing little about this camera is its outside dimensions. It takes high resolution photos and videos, it is packed with features. Has a huge viewing screen. It's so simple to use, all three of my children (7yrs to 12 yrs) and wife immediately took to it.
customer_reviews.author: BigBirdley

customer_reviews.title: user feedback
customer_reviews.text: I have not use video feature much yet however, the camera is very simple to operate for 70 years old and took it to short trip and loved it. small enough to place it in our bag and did not add additional weight. Our daughter also own this camera however she own the larger proffetional canon camera with large long lenzes, but she likes this little camera to take along to where ever she wants to go and shoot the photos of her family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gengi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am not very savy with technical stuff so I had my friend research it for me. I needed something easy to use and compact. This reached my expectations and more. I bought the Neoprene Sleeve Case with it which all fits perfectly in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gma

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes great pictures & easy to use. Had multiple Sony camera, prefer this one definitely. Battery lasts forever and ever
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Takes excellent pictures. No red eye, great night pics. too. Anyone can use this. Battery life is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hartz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE this camera!!! It's perfect for what I need it to do! Our scuba pics come out great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jk070602

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera very much... Perfect to carry anywhere...I take this wherever I travel, easy to shoot....Very nice camera.. I got a very good deal of 159$.
customer_reviews.author: Nags

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Great pics and slim body. The only problem might be that the buttons are a little small....
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Great camera - had it about a week now, but there is definitely a fault in its construction/ease of use. The ON switch and the buttons on the back are set flush with the camera body making it very difficult to navigate with - especially in the dark. Otherwise its an excellent camera - happy with the quality and its ability to take photos in low light without a flash. Video quality seems excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Ilan

customer_reviews.title: Packs a lot of punch in a small body
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for a couple months now. When I received it I was shocked at how small it was, nearly the same size as the battery charger. The picture quality is amazing!! It's easy to use as Canon keeps their functions pretty consistant from model to model. I LOVE this camera, especially for the price payed and the quality received. I would suggest this camera over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Rein

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Overall is good product that does just what it is designed to do. It is easy to use, carry and download. For the price is is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera, fits perfectly in the hand, compact, super well built, progrmas and features easily found and logically laid out, great quality lens, great video mode, good sound quality from the mic. All this for $ 200? Cant beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice point and shoot very compact camera. It feels good in hands, easy to use. Some pictures came out not very sharp. As all Canon cameras, it takes pictures with beautiful colors. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Camera for Snapshots
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera after my other one was dropped in water and it has completely met my expectations. The tiny size is perfect for any pocket or purse and the battery life is amazing. I would definitely recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: xoJessicaLeigh

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in last month. its very handy, stylish and loaded with cool features. i like the picture as well as video quality, both day and night. overall, it is good for day to day use. i would recommend this camera!!
customer_reviews.author: $agar

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Canon Elph digital camera and once again, I am extremely happy with all aspects of the camera. Very easy to use, great battery life, excellent picture quality, all around great camera for point and shoot photography!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McRae

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera with great images and videos
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera..Video Quality is too good. I love this camera a lot..I wanted a simple point and click camera..Glad to find this one, which is so easy and has great pictures/videos. Would definitely recommend to buy this camera
customer_reviews.author: Suresh Nair

customer_reviews.title: Great compact Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Barely can feel the camera when it is in my pocket. The images are fantastic and I can't say one negative thing about it after using it for the past month. Highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schlosser

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: the camera is excellent and it was sent pretty fast. I am very happy with this buy. excellent pictures. great.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne Bejarano

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect to go in your pocket, just make sure you get a screen protector for it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: love this camera!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has everything.i just love this canon camera and i will keep this camera 4 next 5 years...Bcoz i don't trust any other camera 4 gud result.
customer_reviews.author: sweety

customer_reviews.title: canon powershot 940 is
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, best camera I have ever had. Takes great Pictures. All I had to do was push the button, camera does the rest. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: Great Pics & Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very portable (fits into pocket or purse w/o even knowing it's there, takes super clear pictures, and decent videoes. The battery doesn't last as long as I'd like, but overall, heppy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Buster F.

customer_reviews.title: Camera is nice
customer_reviews.text: The camera is nice, I love the picture quality. the slimness of the camera and the hd video. This my first digital camera and it is everything I hoped for. The battery life is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: skim

customer_reviews.title: one of the best compact cameras!
customer_reviews.text: I am now on my 5th Canon compact point and shoot and am amazed at how Canon continues to up their game in this category. I am so happy with this new one. The photos are amazing and it is so durable. I spent days researching and came back to this camera. A real win.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: great cam
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my mom for her bday. She loves it. Its a great camera. Takes guality pictures, small and slim. The black looks good. I recommend this camera for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: canon review
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic unit.the pictures are crystal clear.battery life for me was above and better than previous units i bought.so in love with this camera
customer_reviews.author: Okechukwu K. Okoroma

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the pictures that it takes! I love how small it is... fits easily in my purse or in my pocket. I would recommend it to anyone. The only thing I haven't figured out yet... how to turn the flash on. There is a setting to detect if the picture needs a flash and a setting to turn the flash off but not to keep it on. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: NYCpink

customer_reviews.title: fastclip
customer_reviews.text: Swift delivery with superb features. Well pleased and wife loves it especially with a 16 GB SDHC memory card.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clipp

customer_reviews.title: Quality or Cuteness..
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good starter point and shoot camera for a day out and whatever could go down.. but if you're looking for high quality video/pictures.. This is not the camera for you. I think its compact and cuteness is awesome and I love being able to shove it in my skinny jeans pocket when I'm on the go and it's price is nice and low so dropping it often is not a biggie.
customer_reviews.author: dmonster

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is just cool to have this camera. Small and compact and yet powerful! Nice pictures and videos. But the Videos is not in MP3 format. You have to use QuickTime player to play the videos. Your normal Windows Media Player or Real Player will not open them on your PC. You need to download software like QuickTime.
customer_reviews.author: Chiew Chueng

customer_reviews.title: Lens Error
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera in January of 2010. Now have the Lens Error, a problem that Canon knows about and refuses to fix. Don't buy this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Hooser

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot SD940IS 12.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-inch LCD (Silver)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Portable, easy to use and it takes good quality photos in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Carey D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Canon Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I would definitely recommend purchasing a camera through Amazon. Its cheaper, easier, and a lot more relaxing than going to a store to pick one out. It arrived in perfect condition, same as if I would have went to the store and purchased one myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Honey

customer_reviews.title: small and just okay
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good small camera for my purse. It doesn't do well in darker rooms and the automatic zoom doesn't really zoom. It's best for daylight and close shots. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Chatty Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this camera to anyone who is considering a purchase. I did enjoy the savings I made thru the Amazon/Chase card. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: P Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Compact, but disappointing image, video quality
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, very small. Image quality suffers- both still images and HD video. S90 stills much better, but no HD video. Last years sd 790 had very good picture quality also. Sent sd 940 back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Naoum

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: why Canon? why?!?!?!?!?! i actually regret selling my SD850IS for this piece of garbage. picture quality is horrible... what a downgrade. the 850 was much more attractive, too. this is the only time Canon has failed me... i'm never going for these child's toy-like compact cameras again!
customer_reviews.author: Sally S.

customer_reviews.title: Naccic
customer_reviews.text: I like the wide-angle and the big preview screen. The of small size of this phone makes it easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hsu

customer_reviews.title: This replaced My older Canon Model
customer_reviews.text: Nothing spectacular here...The only plus is the larger LCD screen for viewing. HD video is VERY disappointing. Looks like any other video quality. Zooming doesn't auto focus so don't even try to Zoom while recording video. In HD 2 minute recording was almost 1 GB of memory. Save your $$ and buy the $125 Canon. I will probably be returning this one to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: 5TimesZero

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot SD940IS
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over the Canon SD700IS which I gave to my son. Have not been able to get the video's to play on my XP computers YET
customer_reviews.author: Stevewfd

customer_reviews.title: Removable batteries are a plus
customer_reviews.text: I like the removable battery feature because I always carry a spare. One can be in the charger while you still have the use of the camera. I haven't tried the camera yet - waiting for the price to come down or my SD 750 to break. I have had great experience with Canon though and expect this model to be as good as any others this size.
customer_reviews.author: hifivalue on eBay

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my husband, so he has not yet used it. It looked good and it small and compact which is what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: it is not a very good digital camera
customer_reviews.text: there is no picture quality setting, so 12.1 mega px. just a fake, review it carefully before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Don Phan

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot SD940IS 12.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER


Your camera says a lot about you--and according to Canon’s new PowerShot SD940 IS, you’re into hot design and cool technology. Emerging from your jeans pocket or purse like a sleek little jewel, the PowerShot SD940 IS makes a statement before you even take a picture. And the new menu ensures easy access to all its advanced Canon technology, where 12 megapixels, improved Smart AUTO Mode and 720p HD movies are just the beginning. 

PowerShot SD940 Highlights 



4x optical zoom in action Never leave home without this sleek polished camera
It’s so easy to have the PowerShot SD940 IS on hand wherever you go. Sized to fit anywhere from your jeans pocket to your smallest handbag, you’ll never miss another photo op. All those imitators out there can’t begin to capture the design icon status of a Canon ELPH. New for the PowerShot SD940 IS: smooth lines and brilliant simplicity are rendered in four memorable metallics. 

12.1-megapixel resolution, a 28mm Wide-Angle Lens with 4x optical zoom and Canon’s Optical Image Stabilizer
Canon’s commitment to innovation defines the excitement of the PowerShot SD940 IS. 12.1-egapixel resolution is more than a number, it’s your cutting-edge link to the outstanding clarity and quality you’ve always wanted in your images. Think bold and big, because razor-sharp oversized prints are a breeze. Get the picture? It’s absolutely brilliant. 

The PowerShot SD940 IS has a 4x optical zoom lens that makes it easy to get the inspiring, emotive close-ups that will make your images lasting keepsakes. This magnificent lens gives you the power to shoot distant subjects with razor-sharp precision and stunning lifelike color. So you can brilliantly capture a closer shot of a landscape, or a child’s big smile. 

The PowerShot SD940 IS is equipped with Canon’s acclaimed Optical Image Stabilizer Technology that automatically detects and corrects camera shake--one of the leading causes of fuzzy or blurred shots. Even when zoomed in, you can get the steady, crisp, brilliant images you’ll be proud to shoot and share. And Canon’s Optical Image Stabilizer Technology is so convenient to use. It functions perfectly with or without a flash. 

720p HD movie shooting capability plus HDMI output
The PowerShot SD940 IS lets you record video in beautiful high definition (1,280 x 720 pixels). The camera also makes it easy to enjoy HD movies (and still photos) on your HDTV with a mini-HDMI connector for direct connection to a high-definition monitor or TV. You’ll enjoy the HD experience with no degradation of image or audio in the signal, plus the ability to display up to 130 thumbnails at once. 

Large, crisp 2.7-inch PureColor System LCD with wide viewing angle
The PowerShot SD940 IS gives you a large 2.7-inch PureColor System LCD screen for excellent control when framing your shots. Canon’s PureColor System LCD offers spectacular color, resolution and contrast even when viewed at an angle. The screen is highly durable and easy to see in any light with a scratch-resistant, anti-reflective coating. It also features Night Display for easy viewing in low light--a perfect feature for gathering friends and family around to see your images. 








Improved Smart AUTO Mode intelligently selects the proper settings
Just set the Canon PowerShot SD940 IS to Smart AUTO and you’re ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture taking every time. It’s a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject, knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from 22 specially defined settings. So whether you’re photographing flowers, a captivating sunset or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you’re getting dramatic, memorable images. Even if your subject is moving, Canon’s advanced detection technologies capture the action as it happens. 

Shooting Modes 
Advanced presets for the best possible photos under certain conditions. With 20 Shooting Modes, you’re ready for whatever shot comes your way. 

Easy to use with built in hints and tips
PowerShot SD940 IS lets you focus on the fun and creativity of photography by making your shooting experience easy and intuitive. While you’re shooting, you’ll see helpful hints and informative tips for each function right on the PureColor System LCD monitor. Shooting information is in plain language--no advanced photographic knowledge required. And Canon has even made it easier to search for images on your computer by including the shooting date in the folder name. 

What's in the Box

 * PowerShot SD940 IS Body 
 * Lithium-ion Battery Pack NB-4L 
 * Battery Charger CB-2LV 
 * Wrist Strap WS-DC7 
 * Digital Camera Solution CD-ROM 
 * USB Interface Cable IFC-400PCU 
 * AV Cable AVC-DC400
feature_bullets: 12.1-megapixel resolution; 28mm wide-angle lens with 4x optical zoom and Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer
Capture 720p HD movies; HDMI output connector for easy playback on your HDTV
Crisp 2.7-inch PureColor System LCD with wide viewing angle
Improved Smart AUTO intelligently selects from 22 predefined shooting situations
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars190 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
